metadata.synopsis: She drank a potion given to her by the hag, with the promise that it would make her strong as steel. It did, but it has paralysed her legs. The effects are temporary, but she's angry and embarassed at the situation she's found herself. She doesn't suspect any foul play on the hag's part. We get a clue about this mysterious old woman selling potions in the cave, and through tagged gameplay can reveal that she's been duped. She is frustrated at herself - she wanted to help in the goblin fight, and instead she is sprawled on the ground.

4.speaker: Pandirna
4.context: NodeContext: She sees the player who has robbed her. Shouting for the guards to come help her

11.speaker: Pandirna
11.text: Is there an empty space between your ears? Out! I won't say it again!
11.context: NodeContext: Feigning bravado. Relieved that she's starting to feel better.

16.speaker: Pandirna
16.text: If this isn't the most boring post in the grove, I don't know what is.
16.context: NodeContext: Feigning bravado. Relieved that she's starting to feel better.

22.speaker: Pandirna
22.text: Did that...? No, damn it. Still nothing.

24.speaker: Pandirna
24.text: Maybe - maybe it just needs time to wear off. Fingers crossed the goblins don't return any time soon.

40.speaker: Pandirna
40.text: Look, between us? You're not supposed to be here, but I'll turn a blind eye.
40.context: CinematicNodeContext: She's healed and standing up.

127.speaker: Pandirna
127.text: Just don't touch anything, all right?

48.speaker: Pandirna
48.text: ...I won't say anything... just don't hurt me - please.
48.context: NodeContext: Feigning bravado. Relieved that she's starting to feel better.

70.speaker: Pandirna
70.text: My foot! It moved! Thank you. Thank you so much.
70.context: CinematicNodeContext: As the magic of the healing spell settles over her, she tentatively moves her foot.

78.speaker: Pandirna
78.text: Any goblin comes near me now, and they'll regret it. I feel amazing.
78.context: CinematicNodeContext: She's healed and standing up.

47.speaker: Pandirna
47.text: Look, you're not really supposed to be here, but I'll turn a blind eye. Just don't touch anything, all right?

91.speaker: Pandirna
91.text: Out! Now! I won't say it again!
91.context: NodeContext: Feigning bravado. Relieved that she's starting to feel better.

99.speaker: Pandirna
99.text: My legs - I can stand again. Did you do that? I - Thank you!
99.context: CinematicNodeContext: She's healed and standing up.

122.speaker: Pandirna
122.text: If this isn't the most boring post in the grove, I don't know what is.
122.context: NodeContext: Feigning bravado. Relieved that she's starting to feel better.

139.speaker: Narrator
139.text: *In a secluded place, all alone... it would be too easy to do away with her. Far beneath your talents.*

30.speaker: Player
30.text: Study her face and try to read her emotions.

37.speaker: Narrator
37.text: *You note her grimace of pain. Something is wrong with her legs.*

109.speaker: Pandirna
109.text: Damn it. Don't... don't look at me like that.

71.speaker: Pandirna
71.text: You can stay. Just keep your hands to yourself, all right?

90.speaker: Player
90.text: Don't worry. I'm here to help.

84.speaker: Pandirna
84.text: Damn it, was inventory today? I'm sorry. Nerves are shot after the attack.

32.speaker: Pandirna
32.text: Do what you gotta do - sorry if I don't show you around.

130.speaker: Pandirna
130.text: I'd just fall back down - legs are as steady as a foal's.
130.context: NodeContext: Player has offered to help her up. She's embarassed and annoyed, but trying not sound like it. She appreciates that the player offered.

129.speaker: Pandirna
129.context: NodeContext: Almost muttered to herself in her annoyance.

18.speaker: Player
18.text: She's helpless. You could ensure she never stands again.

123.speaker: Narrator
123.text: *The symphony already plays in your head: every toe snapping like a twig.*

68.speaker: Player
68.text: Where did you get this potion?

137.speaker: Pandirna
137.text: From the old lady in the cave - the one with the 'lotions and potions'.
137.context: CinematicNodeContext: Gestures towards the cave.NodeContext: Player has asked

105.speaker: Pandirna
105.text: To her credit, it worked. I'm as strong as a bugbear. And fearless.
105.context: NodeContext: Trying to feign a bit of bravado at her own situation.

58.speaker: Pandirna
58.text: Course she also warned of side effects. Should have listened. Now I'm stuck guarding crates.
58.context: NodeContext: Thinks this is her own fault. Doesn't suspect any foul play. Almost rolling her eyes at herself at the end as she tries and fails to feign indifference.

133.speaker: Pandirna
133.text: Hah. Deadly serious. Still - the sooner this wears off, the better.

87.speaker: Pandirna
87.text: And then some - just hope this wears off soon.

119.speaker: Player
119.text: Strong brews sometimes have lasting effects. You should prepare for the worst.

126.speaker: Pandirna
126.text: What?! No, no. She said it wouldn't be permanent. It can't be! It'll wear off soon - it has to.
126.context: NodeContext: Panicked and trying to convince herself.

20.speaker: Player
20.text: That doesn't sound like a side effect at all. Let me heal you.

117.speaker: Pandirna
117.text: All right... I guess being fearless won't help if an arrow comes flying right at me.
117.context: NodeContext: sigh before the all right.

59.speaker: Player
59.text: Hold still and I'll cast the spell.

45.speaker: Pandirna
45.context: CinematicNodeContext: She tries to stand up, but her legs buckle and she fals down immediately.NodeContext: She paid the player to heal her, but the player ran away with her money. She's shouting for the guards to come help her.

38.speaker: Player
38.text: Sit tight. I'll be back soon.

19.speaker: Pandirna
19.text: Wait - but... all right. Don't be long.

12.speaker: Player
12.text: You'll be dead in seconds if the goblins come. I can heal you. For a price.

5.speaker: Pandirna
5.text: All right... I guess being fearless won't help if an arrow comes flying right at me. Here.
5.context: CinematicNodeContext: She hands you some money.NodeContext: sigh before the all right.

69.speaker: Wyll
69.text: How generous. Do you charge by the bell, or the spell?

57.speaker: Player
57.text: Forget it. I don't need your money.

145.speaker: Pandirna
145.text: Oh, eh, thank you. You'll still heal me, right?

102.speaker: Pandirna
102.text: All right... I guess being fearless won't help if an arrow comes flying right at me. Here.
102.context: CinematicNodeContext: She hands you some money.NodeContext: sigh before the all right.

118.speaker: Shadowheart
118.text: Very mercenary of you. I wouldn't have done it any differently.
118.context: NodeContext: Pleased/appreciative of the player's decison to wring some money out of Pandima.

83.speaker: Pandirna
83.text: All right... I guess being fearless won't help if an arrow comes flying right at me. Here.
83.context: CinematicNodeContext: She hands you some money.NodeContext: sigh before the all right.

10.speaker: Pandirna
10.text: I wish I could, but... I have nothing left.

116.speaker: Wyll
116.text: How generous. Do you charge by the bell, or the spell?

46.speaker: Pandirna
46.text: I wish I could, but... I have nothing left.

74.speaker: Pandirna
74.text: I told you - I'll be fine. It'll wear off soon.

136.speaker: Player
136.text: Sounds like it was quite the dodgy brew.

98.speaker: Pandirna
98.context: NodeContext: Angry and annoyed at herself.

101.speaker: Player
101.text: Don't worry. You're not the only one to have trouble standing after too many 'potions'.

97.speaker: Pandirna
97.text: I'm not drunk. I just can't... stand.
97.context: NodeContext: Annoyed and snapping at the player. Feigning bravado.

89.speaker: Pandirna
89.text: I wanted an edge against the goblins, and I got it - I'm as strong as a bugbear. And fearless.
89.context: NodeContext: Trying to feign a bit of bravado at her own situation.

112.speaker: Pandirna
112.text: But the old lady - she warned me of side effects. Should have listened. Now I'm stuck guarding crates.
112.context: NodeContext: Thinks this is her own fault. Doesn't suspect any fou play. Almost rolling her eyes at herself at the end as she tries and fails to feign indifference.

141.speaker: Player
141.text: She can't come after you. Take her bag and leave.

114.speaker: Pandirna
114.context: CinematicNodeContext: She tries to stand up, but her legs buckle and she fals down immediately.NodeContext: The player took her bag. She's trying to get it back and then shouts for the guards.

77.speaker: Player
77.text: I'd wager your 'potion' was a paralysing agent.

144.speaker: Pandirna
144.text: What? No, the potion worked! I'm strong as a bugbear. And fearless.
144.context: NodeContext: Player has just suggested she may have been poisoned. She is shocked, horrified and doesn't believe it.

29.speaker: Pandirna
29.text: The old lady warned me that this might happen. That it was a side effect!
29.context: NodeContext: Disbelief. Thinks there is no foul play. Trusts the old woman.

85.speaker: Pandirna
85.text: No. She's been nothing but kind to me. Why would she...
85.context: NodeContext: Disbelief. The old woman has been one of the few people kind to her (her kind are mistrusted by most humans). Shocked.

43.speaker: Pandirna
43.text: ...Sorry, I need a moment. I'm not - not feeling the best. But I'm sure it'll pass.
43.context: NodeContext: Doesn't want to believe it. Hurt at the thought.

49.speaker: Pandirna
49.text: Well, I won't be knocking a potion back any time soon - I can tell you that.
49.context: NodeContext: Feigning bravado at the situation. She's shook.

143.speaker: Player
143.text: It might've been nightshade, maybe hemlock - poison, basically.

13.speaker: Pandirna
13.text: Yes, thanks. I know. Should've never taken that bloody potion.
13.context: NodeContext: Player has asked what's wrong. Embarassed but hiding it with annoyance.

132.speaker: Player
132.text: I'm a cleric. Let me heal you.

31.speaker: Pandirna
31.text: No need. Should be able to stand soon enough - once this bloody potion wears off.
31.context: NodeContext: Player has offered her healing services. She's embarassed but plays it off as indifferences as she waves away the player's help.

66.speaker: Player
66.text: You show too much weakness. You'll be left behind.

39.speaker: Pandirna
39.text: Relax. I'll be up and about once this potion - wait.

104.speaker: Pandirna
104.text: What in the Nine Hells happened to your face? Are you all right?
104.context: NodeContext: She has come face to face with a race (the player) that she has never seen. She thinks the player is ill or that something horrible happened to them. Slightly horrified but still concerned.

94.speaker: Player
94.text: You mentioned a potion. What did you drink?

72.speaker: Pandirna
72.text: Sorry, I didn't mean - I bought it off the old woman in the cave. Sells potions.

80.speaker: Pandirna
80.text: I just meant - if you're feeling ill, there's an old woman in the cave. Sells potions.
80.context: CinematicNodeContext: Gestures towards the cave.NodeContext: Player has barked that their health is of no concern to her. She tries to massage the situation and sincerely offers advice. Feels awkward and embarassed.

61.speaker: Pandirna
61.text: They, erm, have some side effects, but they work. I'm as strong as a bugbear.
61.context: CinematicNodeContext: Gestures to her legs. NodeContext: Sincere and a little awkward.

103.speaker: Pandirna
103.text: She might be able to help with... that.
103.context: CinematicNodeContext: Overal gestures towards the player. NodeContext: Winces slightly as she gestures to the players face. Feels awkward and a little horrified, but isn't actively trying to be insulting.

79.speaker: Player
79.text: I think you should worry about yourself.

73.speaker: Pandirna
73.text: I know. Though I can feel it wearing off. Bloody potion.
73.context: NodeContext: Embarassed and annoyed as the player asked her why she's sprawled on the ground. Nearly mutters the words 'bloody potion' to herself in irritation.

25.speaker: Pandirna
25.text: That's bull. Get the hells out of here - before I call the guards.

142.speaker: Player
142.text: I'm afraid I can't. I've been placed in charge of this area.

125.speaker: Pandirna
125.text: But Zevlor said I... Damn it.

35.speaker: Pandirna
35.text: Figured it was a pity post anyway.

95.speaker: Pandirna
95.text: Bull. Get the hells out, before I call the guards.

124.speaker: Player
124.text: Glare - show her the rage burning in your eyes.

17.speaker: Player
17.text: Hush, girl. Another word and I'll snap your neck.

93.speaker: Pandirna
93.context: NodeContext: You're absolutely terrified. The player has just threatened to kill you if you speak. You simply nod,

138.speaker: Player
138.text: She is vulnerable. Helpless. And you are hungry.

44.speaker: Pandirna
44.text: Why are you looking at me like that?

34.speaker: Player
34.text: Nothing. Do you need a hand?

96.speaker: Player
96.text: Bare your fangs and lunge at her throat.
